info.title: Reflect Money API
info.description:
Interact with the Reflect Money infrastructure via API. Retrieve stablecoin and protocol stats. Generate transactions for minting and redeeming stablecoins. Manage integrations and issue whitelabel stablecoins.

## Rate Limiting
- **Unauthenticated users**: 100 requests per minute
- **Authenticated integrators**: 500 requests per minute

## Authentication
To access higher rate limits, include your API key in the `X-API-Key` header. API keys can be obtained through the integration management endpoints.

get.description: Check if the is operational and healthy.
Retrieve list of available stablecoin types

get.summary: Get supply cap information for all stablecoins
get.description: Retrieve supply caps, current supply, and remaining capacity for all stablecoins

post.summary: Get quote for mint or redeem
post.description: Get a quote for minting or redeeming stablecoins

404.description: Stablecoin with the specified index not found

post.description: Generate a mint transaction for stablecoins using the Reflect Money SDK.

depositAmount.description: Amount to mint in smallest unit

404.description: Stablecoin with the specified index not found

post.description: Generate a burn transaction for stablecoins using the Reflect Money SDK

depositAmount.description: Amount to burn in smallest unit

404.description: Stablecoin with the specified index not found

post.description: Initialize a new integration with branded mint and fee configuration.
Generate a transaction to create a new branded token mint with metadata.
Generate a transaction to transfer mint authority of a branded token.

get.description: Retrieve configuration for a specific integration

put.description: Update configuration for a specific integration

get.description: Retrieve all integrations associated with a specific authority address

data.description: Array of integrations associated with the authority

post.description: Reflect is currently in closed beta and requires whitelisting users. To whitelist your users as integrator, generate and submit transaction returned from this endpoint.

get.description: Retrieve statistics for a specific integration
Retrieve historical statistics for a specific integration
Retrieve current exchange rate for a specific integration

post.description: Initialize the proxy vault for an integration (admin-only).
Generate a transaction to initialize a user's branded token account.
Generate a mint transaction for integration stablecoins.

post.summary: Mint stablecoin and whitelabel in single transaction
post.description: Generate a combined transaction that mints the underlying stablecoin and then whitelabels it in a single call. This combines the functionality of /stablecoin/mint and /integration/mint.

200.description: Combined mint and whitelabel transaction generated successfully

post.description: Generate a redemption transaction for integration stablecoins

post.summary: Redeem whitelabeled stablecoin in single transaction
post.description: Generate a combined transaction that redeems the whitelabeled stablecoin and burns the underlying stablecoin in a single call. This combines the functionality of /integration/redeem and /stablecoin/burn.

200.description: Combined redeem and burn transaction generated successfully

post.description: Generate a claim transaction for integration rewards

get.description: Retrieve realtime APY data for all available stablecoins.

200.description: Successfully retrieved APY data for all stablecoins

get.summary: Get latest exchange rates for all stablecoins
get.description: Retrieve the latest base and receipt exchange rates for all supported stablecoins (USDC+).

200.description: Latest exchange rates for all stablecoins retrieved successfully

get.summary: Get historical exchange rates for a stablecoin
get.description: Retrieve historical base and receipt exchange rates for a specific stablecoin (0: USDC+) and a number of days.

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Number of days for historical data (default: 365)

404.description: Stablecoin with the specified index not found

get.description: Retrieve APY data for a specific stablecoin (realtime data).

404.description: No APY data found for the specified stablecoin

get.summary: Get historical APY data for specific stablecoin
get.description: Retrieve historical APY data for a specific stablecoin over a specified number of days.

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Number of days for historical data (default: 365)

get.summary: Get realtime exchange rate for a stablecoin
get.description: Retrieve the current exchange rate for the specified stablecoin.
Retrieve the most recent protocol events up to a limit.
Retrieve protocol events associated with a signer address.

get.summary: Get historical TVL and volume data
get.description: Retrieve historical Total Value Locked (TVL) and volume data. By default returns last 7 days of data, customise by using the `period` parameter (in days).

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: Number of days of historical data to retrieve (default: 7)

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the TVL data point

tvl.description: Total Value Locked amount in USD

date.description: Date of the volume data point

cumulativeVolume.description: Cumulative volume in USD (BigInt as string)

authenticatedIntegrator.name: Reflect-API-Key
authenticatedIntegrator.description: API key for integrators to access integration-specific endpoints.

message.description: Error message describing what went wrong with the request
message.example: Invalid request data: depositAmount must be positive

message.description: Error message describing the server error

supplyCap.description: Total supply cap in smallest units

fee.description: Fee basis points configured for the integration

principal.description: Outstanding principal held by the integration

authority.description: Authority public key for the integration

yieldBreakdownBps.description: Yield breakdown in basis points (must sum to 10000)

rateToUnderlying.description: Rate of integration stablecoin to underlying stablecoin

rateToUsd.description: Rate of underlying stablecoin to USD
